MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli and Chwilog. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations on site and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15pm on 10th November 2020.
